meanings.definition: A complete list of musical recordings by a particular artist or group.
meanings.sent1: I love looking at the discography of my favorite band to see all their songs.
meanings.sent2: The discography of the Beatles includes many iconic albums.
meanings.sent3: When organizing my music collection, I made a discography of all the songs I own.
meanings.sent4: Her discography of recipes was as extensive as a chef's cookbook.
meanings.sent5: The discography of the artist painted a vivid picture of their musical journey.

meanings.definition: The study or analysis of the recordings made by a particular artist or group.
meanings.sent1: His research project focused on the discography of famous musicians.
meanings.sent2: Music historians often delve into the discography of legendary bands.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for discography made his lectures on music captivating.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the discography of a band is like uncovering a treasure trove of musical history.
meanings.sent5: The discography revealed fascinating insights into the artist's creative process.
